2c187ccb-e2af-4c0e-b8d0-e7edd46baf0b.name: Frequency: Constantly
2c187ccb-e2af-4c0e-b8d0-e7edd46baf0b.notes: Lose 1 HP per minute without it

23f0a696-dd39-4730-9af9-286973b634d8.name: Frequency: Hourly
23f0a696-dd39-4730-9af9-286973b634d8.notes: Lose 1 HP per 10 minutes after missing a hourly dose

04902b95-c803-4338-ad3f-652fcef026a8.name: Frequency: Daily
04902b95-c803-4338-ad3f-652fcef026a8.notes: Lose 1 HP per hour after missing a daily dose

5c2f09e2-354e-4e8b-aba7-657cc2ac270f.name: Frequency: Weekly
5c2f09e2-354e-4e8b-aba7-657cc2ac270f.notes: Lose 1 HP per six hours after missing a weekly dose

a2dbea08-d51d-41a3-9677-8e3e246081f5.name: Frequency: Monthly
a2dbea08-d51d-41a3-9677-8e3e246081f5.notes: Lose 1 HP per day after missing a monthly dose

7d99517d-9e8c-4f8d-b1f6-b0b51178fd7c.name: Frequency: Seasonally
7d99517d-9e8c-4f8d-b1f6-b0b51178fd7c.notes: Lose 1 HP per 3 days after missing a seasonal dose

147ed92d-36ff-4abb-9c1f-426fd8636baf.name: Frequency: Yearly
147ed92d-36ff-4abb-9c1f-426fd8636baf.notes: Lose 1 HP per 2 weeks after missing a yearly dose

215eeb83-090c-4c38-bec8-778b56a3984d.name: Aging
215eeb83-090c-4c38-bec8-778b56a3984d.notes: Age 2 years for each HP lost due to this dependency
